job_title: Graduate Software Engineer - Data Analytics Specialist
job_description: When creating technology that drives human progress, everything needs to be spot on. Our Supplier Process Engineering team works with our suppliers to enable them to produce materials and components of the highest quality. Working closely with our product developers, we select and monitor vendors and suppliers who can meet our high engineering and quality standards. In addition, we perform regular auditing and undertake design and development engineering assignments to develop new products or update existing products. We’re also experts in establishing systems and procedures to enhance overall quality. Join us to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact as a Software Engineer on our Supplier Process Engineering Team in Singapore. What you’ll achieve The Dell SQE (Supplier Quality Engineering) team works with Dell suppliers and the Dell Eng/Operation team to produce and ship materials and components of the highest quality. We assess and qualify suppliers who can meet our engineering and quality standards. In addition, we’re also experts in establishing systems and procedures to enhance overall quality. We manage product and process quality and keep driving continuous quality improvements. We will provide comprehensive training and coach you during your internship, such as general quality, manufacturing techniques, supplier management, and data analysis. etc. You will: You will be responsible for supplier-quality data collection and analysis. You will work with the commodity SQE team and platform SQE team to drive quality improvements based on your data analysis report. Your contribution will help the team to identify improvement opportunities. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Quality Data Analysis Essential Requirements Work with the internal team to collect the quality/ manufacture data and conduct the quality data analysis from different views. Maintain and optimize the data analysis tool and digital tool to support the SQE team operation and improve the team’s working efficiency. Expertise in analytical and problem-solving skills with Good teamwork and project management skills Proficient in using at least one data visualization tool, such as PowerBI Desirable Requirements Master or Bachler degree, major in Data Science Prefer to have development language skills, such as Python Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us. Dell Technologies is committed to the principle of equal employment opportunity for all employees and to providing employees with a work environment free of discrimination and harassment. Read the full Equal Employment Opportunity Policy here . Job ID: R229183 Dell’s Flexible & Hybrid Work Culture At Dell Technologies, we believe our best work is done when flexibility is offered. We know that freedom and flexibility are crucial to all our employees no matter where you are located and our flexible and hybrid work style allows team members to have the freedom to ideate, be innovative, and drive results their way. To learn more about our work culture, please visit our locations page.
